mapper.select: SELECT ssa.`id` ,ssa.`spu_id` ,ssa.`base_sale_attr_id` ,ssa.`sale_attr_name` ,ssav.`id` vId ,ssav.`sale_attr_value_name` FROM spu_sale_attr ssa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssa.`base_sale_attr_id` = ssav.`base_sale_attr_id` AND ssa.`spu_id` = ssav.`spu_id` WHERE ssa.`spu_id` = #{spuId}

SELECT spsa.`id`, spsa.`spu_id`, spsa.`base_sale_attr_id`, spsa.`sale_attr_name`, spsav.`id` vId , spsav.`sale_attr_value_name`, sksav.`id` kId , sksav.`sku_id`, IF(sku_id IS NULL,0,1) is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr spsa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value spsav ON spsa.`base_sale_attr_id` = spsav.`base_sale_attr_id` AND spsa.`spu_id` = spsav.`spu_id` LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value sksav ON sksav.`sale_attr_value_id` = spsav.`id` AND sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE spsa.`spu_id` = #{spuId}
